name: Growth Project
description:
Save the Red Flowers by reaching to them!

But be careful, you have limited growth capabilities. If you reach your limit, you can always go back and regain your growth.

Collect Water Drops to increase your growth limit.

Collect Keys to unlock Doors with same color as them.

Get on top of the buttons to active other constructions.

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

R - Reset current level

Known Bugs:

If you try to move into your body part while it is on top of another object game gets confused about your bodies. Press R to restart until it gets fixed.

This project was started as a part of  "My First Gamejam 2023 #1" but was not uploaded there.
